channel.title: Comments on: Van Halen will probably tour this fall despite the giant cloud of ‘bad idea’ floating above their collective heads

item.title: By: David Lee Roth
item.dc:creator: David Lee Roth
item.description: The Classic van halen was an exciting band of youth and vigor, that is gone, this isn't the type of music that matures it should alway be youthful. Most of Roth's charm was his hair and acrobatics on stage and both are gone, so is his voice. Van Halen was more exciting with the young sexy Roth, and his constant opinions were interesting when he was voluptous, now he just sounds like an old Jew complaining.
item.content:encoded: The Classic van halen was an exciting band of youth and vigor, that is gone, this isn’t the type of music that matures it should alway be youthful. Most of Roth’s charm was his hair and acrobatics on stage and both are gone, so is his voice. Van Halen was more exciting with the young sexy Roth, and his constant opinions were interesting when he was voluptous, now he just sounds like an old Jew complaining.

item.title: By: Van Halen continues its quest to erase the existence of Michael Anthony
item.dc:creator: Van Halen continues its quest to erase the existence of Michael Anthony
item.description: [...] Eddie Van Halen. I can’t wait not to give him my money on this farce of a reunion tour. First, estranged bassist Michael Anthony was photoshopped out of [...]
